title: LTI Mindtree's COO, president of sales in fray for top job as Debashis Chatterjee's tenure ends soon
description: Wipro and LTIMindtree navigate leadership changes. Nachiket Deshpande and Sudhir Chaturvedi are key contenders for LTIMindtree's CEO role. The succession aims at sustaining growth and stability, with an eye on expanding LTIMindtree's market presence.
content: LTI Mindtree's COO Nachiket Deshpande and president of sales Sudhir Chaturvedi are in the race for the top job as Debashis Chatterjeeâ€™s tenure as CEO will end next year.
